mapper.select: SELECT ca.NAME as authorities FROM MAPPING_CLIENT_TO_CLIENT_AUTHORITY mctca LEFT JOIN CLIENT_AUTHORITY ca ON ca.ID = mctca.CLIENT_AUTHORITY_ID WHERE mctca.CLIENT_ID = #{id}
SELECT RESOURCE_SERVER_ID as resourceIds FROM MAPPING_CLIENT_TO_RESOURCE_SERVER WHERE CLIENT_ID = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into mapping_client_to_client_authority SELECT #{clientId} as client_id, id from client_authority WHERE name in ('JUNIOR_CLIENT');
